eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.views.overlay

Class LongPressOverlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.views.overlay.Overlay
      • eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.views.overlay.LongPressOverlay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OverlayConstants

    public class LongPressOverlay
extends Overlay
    A class for handling the long press gesture on the map(over 1000ms). You have to Override the OnLongPress(MotionEvent event) method.
    Author:
    Dylan Stenico

    • Method Detail

      • onTouchEvent

        public boolean onTouchEvent(MotionEvent event,
                   MapView mapView)
        Description copied from class: Overlay
        You can prevent all(!) other Touch-related events from happening!
        By default does nothing (return false). If you handled the Event, return true, otherwise return false. If you returned true none of the following Overlays or the underlying MapView has the chance to handle this event.
        Overrides:
        onTouchEvent in class Overlay
